title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 26
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 26
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Brink's (BCO). Shares of Brink's Co. rose to a record after the provider of security services beat second-quarter estimates and raised its full-year earnings forecast. Earnings and revenue for the period were higher than the average analyst projections in a Bloomberg survey. The results extended a rally that has lifted Brink's shares by more than 180 percent in the past 13 months.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
